_header: Man that in earth abides here
Subjects: Eucharist, Christ’s presence in; carols, of the Eucharist
_description: A song of the Host — three five-line stanzas with refrain ‘Mirabile’, plus burden (bb): ‘Mirabile misterium / In forme of bred ys Godis son’

OxfBal354.First Lines:
Man þat in erth abydys hereThov mvst beleve with owten
                    dere…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…Which flesshedly man in deiteDyed for vs vpon a
                        treMirabileExplicit
